title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: When using the new class wizard in Build 20011106, with a .java file open in the editor and clicking the new class button, the 'Enclosing Type' field is blank for nested classes.
EB: The 'Enclosing Type' field in the new class wizard should default to the current type in the editor.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open a .java file in the editor. 2. Click the new class button. 3. Check the 'Enclosing Type' field in the wizard.
